name: Battle of Genesis
description:
You are a hero born in the chaotic world, in order to save the world, you fight against the evil forces to the end, at this moment there are other chaotic heroes have been born. Who can save the world? Who can have the most beautiful goddess in the world? Who can be the master of the world? This is a Idle RPG game where any player can find fun for themselves!

Game Features

  • Casual Idle Gameplay:
    Casual and easy placement game, without the need for complex operation, you can automatically obtain experience, equipment, props and other resources;
    Automatic leveling is more likely to make you relaxed as you wish, without delaying anything.

  • Guild system:
    Join the guild to get help from other members and resist the invasion of evil forces together;
    Completing guild quests and participating in guild wars can earn you tons of rewards.

  • Homeland System:
    Build your own home, not only can you harvest various rewards, but you can also send your troops on adventures to get more rewards.

  • Diverse Hero Matching:
    Heroes from history and mythology will follow your command and fight valiantly against the enemy;
    By matching different combinations, you are able to form a variety of genres.

    Feature Gameplay

    • Siege Battle:
      Battle with members of other guilds, the winner gets the possession of the city as well as a large number of rewards; the loser also has generous rewards to collect;

    • World BOSS:
      All players who participate in the event can receive rewards for killing the BOSS.

    • Guild Play:
      Guild Dungeon: All members can participate, after killing all participants can get rewards;
      Guild Battle: Battle for the city with 3 other guilds and receive rewards based on the final ranking;
      Guild Battle: seize resource points on the map, and get rich rewards after occupying them for a certain period of time.
      Guild Treasure Map: All members explore the treasure map belonging to their own guild together.

    • Arena:
      There are multiple ways to play the arena:
      Divine Wargames: Choose 7 heroes to join the lineup and fight with other players, the more victories the more generous the rewards;
      Brave Ladder: Defeat other players to gain points and raise the segment, and finally issue season rewards according to the segment;
      Battle of Sanctuary: each player can send three teams to compete with other players around the world, and each season ends with rewards based on point rankings.

    • Mystery Dungeon:
      Endless Expedition: a total of 9 levels, defeat the guarding monsters to get rewards, can be challenged once a day
      Labyrinth Expedition: In the labyrinth, heroes can't recover after being injured or killed in action. You need to explore the labyrinth frame by frame, which will trigger many unknown events.
      Ancient Ruins: You need to send different heroes to enter three ancient ruins, and you can use the materials obtained to exchange for very precious props
    .
